A big part of celebration old korea was food.

And it continues to be.

The role of taste coordinators is important.

According to my paternal cousins, my mom was one

As well as others in her family.

They carried on that important tradition.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Similarly we have event coordinators now days

------------------------------------------------------------------------

What about life coordinators.

Partnership with God.

Plan much as possible but allow for some surprises and unexpected outcome.
